title: LIVE: All lines closed near London Euston due to emergency incident with Manchester trains affected
description: Emergency services are in attendance with 'major disruption' to services across the UK
content:
Lines reopened
The lines open again and services are beginning to resume.
Transport operators are warning of 60 minute delays and some cancellations.
Disruption expected to last until the end of the day.

title: Maguire header seals Man Utd's first Anfield win in 10 years
description: Liverpool suffer fourth consecutive defeat as Amorim wins back-to-back Premier League games for the first time
content:
Liverpool’s slump continued as Harry Maguire’s header sealed a 2-1 victory for Manchester United in an exhilarating Premier League contest at Anfield.

title: Mystery drone sparks travel chaos at Brit holiday hotspot as flights diverted from Majorca Airport
description:
MAJORCA airport has been thrown into chaos after a mystery drone was spotted hovering over it.
Flights were unable to take off or land for a...
content:
MAJORCA airport has been thrown into chaos after a mystery drone was spotted hovering over it.
Flights were unable to take off or land for a period from around 6pm UK time – with several planes forced to divert to other airports.

title: Two Aston Villa safety advisers spoke out against Tel Aviv match
description: The councillors on the football club’s safety advisory group called for the game to be stopped entirely because of the suffering of Palestinians
content:
She wrote: “Aston Villa has a choice. Hosting Maccabi Tel Aviv right now sends a message that ignores the suffering of Palestinians. Please sign this petition and help us urge the club to stand on the right side of history.”
